reference.title: CLI overview
reference.shortdesc: The command-line tools perform different functions and operations, these CLI tools are described individually.

section.title: Description
section.p: Tools can be located in a number of directories, dependent on the tool in question in each case.
By default, the command-line tools are installed into the following locations on each platform:

row.entry: C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin, C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin\install, and C:\Program Files\couchbase\server\bin\tools.
